website_summaries.verdict: Okay for the price, but the jaws don't provide the bite necessary for some jobs.
cons: Jaws lack bite, causing the wrench to slip

customer_reviews.title: As Dutch Henry Brown  would say "They look real pretty wouldn't ya say ".
customer_reviews.text: I had to change my review after using them on a minor pipe job at home . For the price really good buy if using on unions only, otherwise on a pipe it doesn't grip at all. I admit they do look nice hanging on the shop wall . As Dutch Henry Brown would say "They look real pretty wouldn't ya say" .
customer_reviews.author: Peachpatch

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better wrench.
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money for a better pipe wrench. There's a reason this is so cheap. It's incredibly difficult to tighten, which makes it difficult to make it do its job.
customer_reviews.author: ElBluf

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: you always need a basic set of tools when you buy a new house and this was one that i got. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles bishop Young

customer_reviews.title: Not for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: got what I paid for. Cheap wrench for occasional users I suppose. Teeth dont catch well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a pipe wrench and it works. Quality is good. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: way too much play. lots of slippage. agree with other reviewers on passing this one up.
customer_reviews.author: OCD_OBD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for bigger openings Works well and pretty light
customer_reviews.author: D. Cherney

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT RIGID JAW OR TEETH!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FIT RIGID PARTS. is not identical PARTS as the seller claims. The one star is for deceiving people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid wrench with a lighter weight. Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: can't grip anything
customer_reviews.text: Has the grip strength of an anemic two year old. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: rabia al-basri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grips well. Light weight was a big plus for a wrench this size.
customer_reviews.author: PaKettle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a great price! Made my repair easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid purchase for the price. The vice portion has a little play in it which is why I deducted a star but I am still very happy with my purchase. I purchased this to use as a prop for my arm when welding out of position and it has helped quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rccolaman

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, light weight and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for me, looks solid enough to use for future projects, I like the long handle for leverage and mine worked as expected. Like that this is not overly heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and the tool is less of a wrench ...
customer_reviews.text: Great seller and the tool is less of a wrench than costly ones but for this price it's awesome. I put in my grinder box for when I need to sharpen the lawn mower blade.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work all the time and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: James B

product_meta.title: CARTMAN 18" Aluminum Pipe Wrench
product_meta.description:
Product Description
Nearly 40% lighter than comparable cast-iron models. Jaws and all other parts identical to Ridgid heavy duty wrenches.
From the Manufacturer
Aluminum Straight Handle Pipe Wrench. Sturdy housing and I-beam handle with full floating hook jaw, non-stick adjustment nut and replaceable hook and heel jaws. These Aluminum pipe wrenches are nearly 40% lighter than comparable cast-iron models of the same size. Pipe capacity: 2-1/2 . Weight: 3-3/4 lbs.
feature_bullets: Lightweight aluminum handle saves weight and reduces user fatigue
Durable drop-forged carbon steel head with sandblast finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
